text: Darjeeling Jela Dokan Sramik Union (translation: Darjeeling District Shop Workers Union), a trade union of shop workers in Darjeeling District, West Bengal, India. DJDSU is affiliated to the Indian Federation of Trade Unions. Category:Indian Federation of Trade Unions Category:Retail trade unions Category:Trade unions in West Bengal
title: Darjeeling Jela Dokan Sramik Union
